column4: ok, i have this problem: i'm trying to install my nvidia driver and i have 2.6.24-19-generic. the driver says he cant compile because he cant find the kernel source tree. when i look in /usr/src i cant find any folder with my kernel name in. but in synaptic all packages with my kernel name are installed. What can i do?
: are the linux-headers installed for your kernel?
sorry, i was afk. How do see if the linux headers are installed?
